compilerExecutable.markdownDescription: The executable path to the luac.cross compiler (e.g. *"/opt/lua/esp8266/5.3/luac.cross"* or *"C:\Temp\luac.cross.exe"*)

include.markdownDescription: Specifies a list of glob patterns that match files to be included in LFS image. (e.g. ./lfs/*.lua)

outDir.markdownDescription: Specify an output folder for all emitted files. Default is **./out**

outFile.markdownDescription: Specify an output a flash image file. Default is **lfs.img**
